title: Which was immediate result of the European age of exploration? - Quora

response.answer_text: For most Amerindians the immediate result was catching an infectious disease (or two, or three) that they had no immunity to, creating a mass die-off over and over, usually before they met any Europeans or Africans carrying them. For Europeans there was no immediate effect since both the concept of “new” continents and the new foodstuffs took a while to spread. As they did effects were massive but not immediate.

The immediate result of the european age of exploration was advancement and knowledge of new “Worlds” by the explorers. These explorers used caravelas and galleons in their journeys and expeditions. New mapping expeditions were made new medicine was learned,etc.
